original_text: There is nobody who never does a wrong thing. So when your people do not obey you, you will be angry with them. You will put them under the power of their enemies. Those enemies will take them away as their prisoners. Perhaps they will take them to a country that is far away. Perhaps it will be near.
korean_text: 주께 범죄하지 아니하는 사람이 없사오니 그들이 주께 범죄하므로 주께서 그들에게 진노하사 그들을 적국에게 넘기시매 적국이 그들을 사로잡아 땅의 원근을 막론하고 끌고 간 후에

sentences.original_text: There is nobody who never does a wrong thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 잘못된 일을 하지 않는 사람은 아무도 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: So when your people do not obey you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신의 백성이 당신께 순종하지 않을 때,

sentences.original_text: you will be angry with them.
You will put them under the power of their enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 그들의 적들의 권세 아래 두실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Those enemies will take them away as their prisoners.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 적들은 그들을 포로로 붙잡아 갈 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Perhaps they will take them to a country that is far away.
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그들은 그들을 먼 나라로 데려갈 것입니다.
